name: Cops Kissing Each Other
description:
In this game - you have a choice. Use violence or use peace to finish your enemies.

Use your charm to access a kiss minigame to disarm the bad guys. Or, whack the thieves with your billy club if all else fails.

Minigames, fighting, characters, love, war. It's all here in Cops Kissing Each Other.

- Unlock characters
- Fall in love
- Giant bosses
- Procedurally generated levels
- Minigames about, you know, kissing
- Beat up your enemies with an item upgrade system

Kiss or Kill!!!
